amendment.description: Amendment provides a technical revision to language in the bill to ensure that the nation's organ transplantation system recognizes the health care needs of children; and provides for a study of immunosuppressive drug coverage for children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 106-557 to provide a technical revision to language in the bill to ensure that the nation's organ transplantation system recognizes the health care needs of children and to provide for a study of immunosupressive drug coverage for children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 99).
